Item.method_code:
' called onBeforeDelete of relationship Dim thisRelatedItemRel As Item = Me.newItem(Me.GetType(),"get") Dim id as String = Me.getID() If id = "" Then return Me 'not a single id in context, do nothing
thisRelatedItemRel.setID(id) thisRelatedItemRel.setAttribute("select","team_id,source_id(team_id,config_id,name,related_project_keyed_name),related_id(team_id,config_id,keyed_name,allow_team_change_logic,related_projects)") thisRelatedItemRel.setAttribute("serverEvents","0") thisRelatedItemRel = thisRelatedItemRel.apply()
Dim relatedItemId As String = thisRelatedItemRel.getProperty("related_id","") If relatedItemId <> "" Then Me.setAttribute("relatedItemId",relatedItemId)
Dim relItem As Item = thisRelatedItemRel.getPropertyItem("related_id") Me.setAttribute("relatedItemType",relItem.GetType()) Dim val As String = relItem.getProperty("team_id","") val = val.Replace(" ","") Me.setAttribute("relatedItemTeamId",val) Me.setAttribute("relatedItemRelatedProjects",relItem.getProperty("related_projects","")) Me.setAttribute("relatedItemAllowTeamChange",relItem.getProperty("allow_team_change_logic",""))
Me.setAttribute("folderRelatedProjectKN",thisRelatedItemRel.getPropertyItem("source_id").getProperty("related_project_keyed_name","")) End If
Return Me
Item.name: Del FolderTeam on RelatedItems
